nodes.text: Ploovo Two-For-One was a male individual who acted as Papa Toren's shadow broker for the Corporate Sector and Tion Cluster. One contract for his services was included in the "gift package" that Toren made to Grakkus the Hutt. The letter accompanying the gifts assured that Ploovo brought with him thousands of contacts, which would help open the Nilgaard sector for business. At some point, the bounty hunter Bossk apprehended Ploovo's right hand thug Durgaagoo.
